      <div class="text">
       <h1>
        <span>
         Social networking,
         <strong>
          back in your hands
         </strong>
        </span>
       </h1>
       <p>
        <span>
         Follow friends and discover new ones among more than 4.4M people. Publish anything you want: links, pictures, text, video. All on a platform that is community-owned and ad-free.
        </span>
       </p>
       <a class="cta button" href="/communities">
        <span>
         Get started
        </span>
       </a>
       <button class="cta button alt">
        <span class="icon-circled">
         <span class="ion-md-play">
         </span>
        </span>

        </span>

     <div id="features">
      <div class="feature container">
       <div class="right visual">
        <i class="ion-md-globe">
        </i>
       </div>
       <div class="left text">
        <i class="xs-show ion-md-globe">
        </i>
        <h2>
         <span>
          Find your perfect community
         </span>
        </h2>
        <p>
         <span>
          Mastodon isn’t a single website like Twitter or Facebook, it's a network of thousands of communities operated by different organizations and individuals that provide a seamless social media experience.
         </span>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="feature container">
       <div class="left visual">
        <i class="ion-md-lock">
        </i>
       </div>
       <div class="right text">
        <i class="xs-show ion-md-lock">
        </i>
        <h2>
         <span>
          Safer social media experience
         </span>
        </h2>
        <p>
         <span>
          Mastodon comes with
          <strong>
           effective anti-abuse tools
          </strong>
          to help protect yourself. Thanks to the network's spread out and independent nature there are
          <strong>
           more moderators
          </strong>
          who you can approach for personal help, and
          <strong>
           communities with strict codes of conduct
          </strong>
          .
         </span>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="feature container">
       <div class="right visual">
        <i class="ion-md-list-box">
        </i>
       </div>
       <div class="left text">
        <i class="xs-show ion-md-list-box">
        </i>
        <h2>
         <span>
          Sharing your thoughts has never been more convenient
         </span>
        </h2>
        <p>
         <span>
          You have 500 characters. You can adjust the thumbnails of your pictures with focal points. You can use custom emojis, hide things behind spoiler warnings and choose who sees a given post. Messed it up? You can delete &amp; redraft for quick corrections.
         </span>
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="container">
       <div class="banner">
        <a class="cta button" href="/communities">
         <span>

         </span>
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="container feature">
       <div class="feature-angle-container">
        <div class="feature-angle">
         <i class="ion-md-book">
         </i>
         <h3>
          <span>
           Mastodon for the individual
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          <span>
           Without an incentive to sell you things, Mastodon allows you to consume content you enjoy uninterrupted. Your feed is chronological, ad-free and non-algorithmic—you decide who you want to see!
          </span>
         </p>
         <a class="link-button" href="/communities">
          <span>
           Join a community
          </span>
          <i class="ion-ios-arrow-forward">
          </i>
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="feature-angle">
         <i class="ion-md-business">
         </i>
         <h3>
          <span>
           Mastodon for the organization
          </span>
         </h3>
         <p>
          <span>
           Host your own social media platform on your own infrastructure. Don't let your business or non-profit depend on a company that could change the rules of the game—write your own rules!
          </span>
         </p>
         <a class="link-button" href="https://docs.joinmastodon.org/user/run-your-own/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
          <span>
           Install a server
          </span>
          <i class="ion-ios-arrow-forward">
          </i>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
